targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All'
        ELSE $origin
    END AS origin_param,
    CASE
        WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All'
        ELSE $build_architecture
    END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE
        WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All'
        ELSE $build_config_name
    END AS build_config_name_param,
    builds.checkout_id,
    builds.id,
    builds.origin,
    builds.comment,
    builds.architecture,
    COALESCE(builds.config_name, 'unnamed') AS config_name,
    COALESCE(format_cached_url(builds.config_url), '') AS config_url,
    COALESCE(CAST(builds.start_time AS TEXT), '') AS start_time_str,
    COALESCE(
        TO_CHAR(builds.duration * INTERVAL '1 second', 'HH24:MI:SS.MS'),
        ''
    ) AS duration_str,
    CASE 
        WHEN builds.valid = false THEN 1 
        WHEN builds.valid = true THEN 0 
        ELSE -1 
    END AS valid_num,
    CASE 
        WHEN builds.log_url IS NULL THEN '' 
        ELSE 'File' 
    END as log_url_text,
    format_cached_url(builds.log_url),
    builds.compiler,
    builds.command,
    checkouts.git_commit_hash,
    checkouts.patchset_hash,
    builds.misc,
    tests.status_num AS tests_status_num
FROM builds
LEFT OUTER JOIN checkouts
    ON checkouts.id = builds.checkout_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
        MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS status_num
    FROM tests
    WHERE
        build_id = '$id' AND
        COALESCE(start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
        origin LIKE ${origin}
) AS tests ON TRUE
WHERE builds.id = '$id'

SELECT
    output_file ->> 'name' AS name,
    format_cached_url(output_file ->> 'url') AS url
FROM
    builds,
    jsonb_array_elements(builds.output_files) AS output_file
WHERE
    builds.id = '$id'

SELECT
    (TIMESTAMP $__timeFrom() + (ordinality * interval '1 second')) AS time,
    line AS message
FROM
    unnest(string_to_array((
        SELECT
            regexp_replace(regexp_replace(log_excerpt, '([^ ]) ', E'\\1​ '), ' ', ' ​') AS solid_log_excerpt
        FROM
            builds
        WHERE
            id = '$id'
    ), E'\n')) WITH ORDINALITY AS lines(line, ordinality)

SELECT
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN 'Root' ELSE '$test_path' END AS node_title,
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN '' ELSE '⮌ Parent' END AS node_parent_title,
    CASE
        WHEN POSITION('.' IN '$test_path') = 0 THEN ''
        ELSE SUBSTRING('$test_path' FROM 1 FOR LENGTH('$test_path') - POSITION('.' IN REVERSE('$test_path')))
    END AS node_parent_path,
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN '' ELSE '⮌ Root' END AS node_root_title,
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param

/* Massage */
SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    origins,
    path,
    CASE
        WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN path
        ELSE substring(path FROM length('$test_path') + 2)
    END AS name,
    tests,
    COALESCE(CAST(min_start_time AS TEXT), '') AS min_start_time_str,
    COALESCE(
        FLOOR(EXTRACT(epoch FROM AGE(max_end_time, min_start_time))/3600) ||
        TO_CHAR(AGE(max_end_time, min_start_time), ':MI:SS.MS'),
        ''
    ) AS total_duration_str,
    status_num
FROM (
    /* Aggregate */
    SELECT
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT origin, ', ') AS origins,
        LEFT(base_prefix, CHAR_LENGTH(base_prefix) - 1) AS path,
        MIN(start_time) AS min_start_time,
        MAX(end_time) AS max_end_time,
        COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS tests,
        MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], status::text), 0) - COALESCE(waived::int, 2) * 7) AS status_num
    FROM (
        /* Filter tests and extract path prefixes */
        SELECT
            tests.origin,
            tests.id,
            /*
             * Prefix one level deeper than the displayed test's path,
             * i.e. the prefix children of this test should have
             */
            COALESCE(
                /*
                 * Handle the parent node of this test being displayed:
                 * cut the test path up to and including the first dot
                 * after the currently-displayed test's path, if possible.
                 */
                LEFT(
                    tests.path,
                    LENGTH('$test_path') +
                    NULLIF(POSITION('.' IN SUBSTRING(tests.path FROM LENGTH('$test_path') + 2)), 0) +
                    1
                ),
                /* Handle this test's node being displayed */
                tests.path || '.'
            ) AS base_prefix,
            tests.start_time,
            tests.start_time + (tests.duration * INTERVAL '1 second') AS end_time,
            tests.status,
            tests.waived
        FROM tests
        WHERE
            tests.build_id = '$id' AND
            COALESCE(tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
            tests.origin LIKE $origin AND
            ('$test_path' = '' OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.'))
    ) AS filtered_tests
    GROUP BY
        base_prefix
) AS aggregated_tests
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC,
    name ASC

SELECT
    TO_TIMESTAMP(0) AS time,
    COALESCE(tests.status::text, 'UNKNOWN') AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS value
FROM tests
WHERE
    tests.build_id = '$id' AND
    COALESCE(tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    tests.origin LIKE $origin AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR tests.path = '$test_path' OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.'))
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY metric

SELECT
    TO_TIMESTAMP(0) AS time,
    tests.path AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS value
FROM tests
WHERE
    tests.build_id = '$id' AND
    COALESCE(tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    tests.status = 'FAIL' AND
    tests.origin LIKE $origin AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR tests.path = '$test_path' OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.'))
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    tests.id,
    tests.origin,
    tests.path,
    tests.comment,
    COALESCE(CAST(tests.start_time AS TEXT), '') AS start_time_str,
    COALESCE(
        TO_CHAR(tests.duration * INTERVAL '1 second', 'HH24:MI:SS.MS'),
        ''
    ) AS duration_str,
    COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7 AS status_num
FROM tests
WHERE
    tests.build_id = '$id' AND
    COALESCE(start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
    tests.origin LIKE $origin AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR tests.path = '$test_path' OR tests.path LIKE ('$test_path' || '.%'))
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC,
    tests.path ASC
